# Equations

## Equations

- Calculate sample variance ($s^2$)
- 標本分散の計算

\begin{equation}
{s}^{2}=\frac{1}{n-1}\sum{{\left({X}_{i}-\overline{X}\right)}^{2}}
\label{eq:variance}
\end{equation}

## Equations

- The Gaussian (Normal) equation
- 正規分布密度関数

\begin{equation}
f(x|\mu, \sigma^2) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}} \exp\left(-\frac{(x - \mu)^2}{2\sigma^2}\right)
\label{eq:gaussian}
\end{equation}
